rules_text:
Whenever one or more creature cards leave your graveyard, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
Decompose into Doom Whisperer {5}{B}{B} [i]({5}{B}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a 6/6 black Nightmare Demon creature with mana cost {3}{B}{B}, flying, trample, and “Pay 2 life: Surveil 2.” It loses all other card types. Decompose only as a sorcery.)[/i]
notes:
New card — Replaced Splitting Headache

I know there was a request to keep Splitting Headache in the file, but I wanted at least one mythic ooze, and black ended up feeling like the most interesting and approrpriate place to put it. Splitting Headache is also relatively similar to the new addition of Chef’s Shadow.
